abstract: Colorado prosecutors drop child sexual assault charges against Joshua Dolezal, brother of Rachel Dolezal, former NAACP chapter president who was revealed to be falsely identifying herself as black woman.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Colorado have dropped child sexual assault charges against the estranged brother of a former N.A.A.C.P. chapter president who came under criticism for falsely identifying herself as a black woman.

headline.main: Rachel Dolezal’s Brother Cleared in Sex Case
headline.print_headline: Dolezal’s Brother Cleared in Sex Case

snippet: Prosecutors in Colorado have dropped child sexual assault charges against the estranged brother of a former N.A.A.C.P. chapter president who came under criticism for falsely identifying herself as a black woman.

keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
